ParentPowered | CTO | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE
ParentPowered is an Ed Tech startup that creates easy-to-use tools for great parenting. The company has significant momentum and is rapidly scaling its first product, Ready4K, in the U.S. and beyond.
Our stack:
  * PostgreSQL, Ruby, AWS, Sidekiq, Twilio, Nexmo, Plivo, HTML, CSS
What we offer:
  * Equity in the company 
  * A competitive salary 
  * Full health, dental, and vision benefits 
  * Paid time off and sick leave 
  * Flexible working hours with the potential to work from home 
  * An exciting development road map that includes core platform enhancements, a self-service administration panel, two-way communication, personalization, localization, social networking, and machine learning 
  * Great people 
Email Tiffany @ tiffany.graham@parentpowered.com
